abstract: Mudslides and flooding following torrential rains in Tuscany and Liguria in Italy leave at least six people dead and hundreds homeless.
snippet: Flailing through mounds of debris and sludge, rescue workers hunted for survivors in Tuscany and Liguria on Wednesday after mudslides and flooding left at least six people dead and hundreds homeless.
lead_paragraph: Flailing through mounds of debris and sludge, rescue workers hunted for survivors in Tuscany and Liguria on Wednesday after mudslides and flooding left at least six people dead and hundreds homeless.

headline.main: Mudslides and Flooding Ravage Areas of Scenic Beauty in Italy
headline.print_headline: Mudslides and Flooding Ravage Areas of Scenic Beauty in Italy
headline.seo: Flooding Ravages Tuscany and Liguria in Italy
